alert.note: Alert for Cimarron (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 10:53PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Cimarron County through 1130 PM CDT... At 1052 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles west of Keyes, or 10 miles northeast of Boise City, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Keyes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
